content.raw: Regardless of the implementation, can we all switch to MATLAB's error handling mechanism -- throwing an error (which prints a red message, beeps, and interrupts your .m script) instead of returning hxResult like we do in C?
content.html: Regardless of the implementation, can we all switch to MATLAB's error handling mechanism -- throwing an error (which prints a red message, beeps, and interrupts your .m script) instead of returning hxResult like we do in C?
